landing.title: Hello! I'm Suchith
landing.about: Welcome! I'm an enthusiastic developer and computer science student passionate about machine learning, low-level programming, and open-source software. As a research assistant, I'm committed to pushing the boundaries of technology.

topics.title: Professional Insights

topics.title: General Exploration

about_section.title: A Little About Me
about_section.content:
I'm a developer - I enjoy building stuff on the web and otherwise. I am currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in computer science at the Dalhousie University, Canada.

I'm a Full-Stack programmer who also specializes in GUI and CLI (Command-line interface) based application programming for Windows and Linux. I am passionate about computers and servers and intrigued about operating systems and their workings.

experiences.description: Working with Professor Qiang Ye on Network Security using machine learning techniques to build intruction detection systems (IDS).

Worked as a freelance web developer to build a tailored software solution to meet company specific needs. Customized the website UI to enhance investment appeal. Configured a web server to handle requests.

Perform as the system administrator for the company.

Worked as a freelance web developer for the Fredericton Legal Advice Clinic (FLAC). Designed and built a web system to handle appointment bookings. Engineered admin pages to allow easy management of appointments.

Perform as the system administrator for the company.

Completed two co-op work terms (internships) at Introhive as an associate software engineer performing the role of a full stack developer. Engineered solutions to existing stories, fixed multiple gating and top priority bugs and performed rigorous testing of the application.
